islandutils.notifications.title: Notifications
islandutils.options.music_highq.desc:
Enables High(er) quality music, this replaces the music on island with higher quality versions.

Note: This does not apply to Hub music or Dynaball
islandutils.options.music_olddynaball.de:
Replaces Island's Dynaball music with 'Shoot 'em Up (NGS Live)' by Issac Wilkins
(The music previously used by IslandUtils before the official music)
islandutils.options.music_tgttosdouble.d: Speeds up the music when the TGTTOS Double Time modifier is active
islandutils.options.music_tgttosdome.des: Replaces the TGTTOS music with when
islandutils.options.classic_hitw_annouce: Enables the trap annoucement voice lines from the original 'Super Hole In The Wall' map
islandutils.options.classic_hitw_music.d: Replaces the Hole In The Wall music with the music from the original 'Super Hole In The Wall' map
islandutils.options.notifs_server_menu.d: Enables showing notifications next to MCC Island in the server menu
islandutils.options.notifs_crafting.desc: Enables notifications for your completed Blueprint Assembler or Fusion Forge items
islandutils.options.chest_scavenging_tot: Enables showing your total rewards when scavenging items. These are shown in the menu and when hovering over the Confirm button
islandutils.options.chest_remnant_highli: Enables a red background behind item remnants which can be scavenged
islandutils.options.chest_fishing_upgrad: Enables icons on available fishing upgrades
islandutils.options.friendnotifs_in_game: Enables sending 'Friends in this game' notifications
islandutils.options.friendnotifs_in_lobb: Enables sending 'Friends in this lobby' notifications
